Introduction

Year 7 Class 1 (Korean: 칠학년일반; Japanese: 七學年一班) is a seven-member girl group under Dareun Byeol Entertainment. They debuted on January 24, 2014 with their first single "Oppa Virus." They presumably disbanded in 2018 due to inactivity after their SNS sites were closed and members went onto individual activities.
